definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
variant of 閹|阉[yan1]/to castrate/variant of 淹[yan1]/to delay
Tianji'an district of Huainan city 淮南市[Huai2 nan2 shi4], Anhui
Shi Nai'an (1296-1371), author of Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]
Tianji'an district of Huainan city 淮南市[Huai2 nan2 shi4], Anhui
see 餘甘子|余甘子[yu2 gan1 zi3]
see 餘甘子|余甘子[yu2 gan1 zi3]

sentences.english: This thesis takes the lightning accident in ZiJin Temple of Suzhou as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以蘇州紫金庵遭雷擊事故爲案例。

sentences.english: Owned by the Small Nun, it is the guardian of the nunnery's vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 小尼姑之愛犬，負責看守靜修庵之菜園。

sentences.english: Seokguram GrottoBulguksa is also known as the temple of the Buddha Land and home of the Seokguram Grotto.
sentences.chinese: 石窟庵和佛國寺也稱作聖地寺院和石窟家園。

sentences.english: The Longdong Nunnery hidden in pines and cypresses, backs on to the mountain and faces south.
sentences.chinese: 龍洞庵背依高山，坐北面南，掩映於蒼松翠柏之中。

sentences.english: There are a pair of shoes, you have taken care Xitang Yong Um go hunting.
sentences.chinese: 還有一雙鞋子，託你們帶到西塘永狩庵去。

definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
a room in a Buddhist monastery/a temple
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
name in religion (of Buddhist or Daoist within monastery)
